title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4500.16 - Closing of accounts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4500.16 - Closing of accounts

State Regulations

Excepting bearer accounts, accounts may be closed at the
request of an account holder made in-person or by mail or other method
consistent with the plan of operation. For those requests made by mail, account
wagering licensees shall mail to the account holder's official address or send
via electronic funds transfer to the account specified in the account wagering
application all funds within five business days of receiving such request. All
other requests shall be processed immediately. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4500.16

Amended

New

York State Register July 26, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 30, eff. 7/26/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
